name: Better GitHub Widget
body:
#### A beautiful widget for your site
Better GitHub Widget is the best looking widget to display your GitHub projects, it simply blends with your theme.

#### Client side magic
All of the magic of this widget happens on the user's browser, so it does not stress your server.

![Better GitHub Widget in action](http://ceksblog.s3.amazonaws.com/bgw.png)

### Installation

0. Go to the [wordpress.org page](http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/better-github-widget/)
1. Upload the contents of the zip (including the folder) to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory
2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
3. Place the widget to a widget area and set your GitHub username
